fullText:
Reliable Resources

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, warlord, Resourceful Presence class feature
Benefit: When an ally who can see you spends an action point to take an extra action and doesn’t use that action to make an attack, the ally gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 144.
name: Reliable Resources
